title: Is the history of the National Football Federation in matters of free expression accurately recorded on this list?
subtitle: There is a list that allegedly demonstrates the hypocrisy of the National Association of Football with regard to freedom of expression that deals largely with real incidents - but whether its interventions relate to "freedom of speech" issues are debatable, and some of its details are inaccurate.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The list accurately depicts the history of the National Football Union on issues of freedom of expression.
